import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Row,Col,ListGroup,Image,Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderPage = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length ===0 ? Your cart is Empty! : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item,index)=>( {item.name} {item.qty}x $ {item.price} = ${item.qty*item.price} ))} )} {cart.paymentMethod} ) } export default PlaceOrderPage
